message: When I step inside, my eyes go wide.
The interior looks just as old-fashioned as the place did from the outside.
It definitely isn't the futuristic look that I associate with Platinum Jail. It's like stepping into yet another world.
There's a table and sofa in the living room. All of the furniture looks expensive. In the back, a staircase leads up to the second floor.

name: 蒼葉
message: "A guesthouse? I'm not even really sure what that is."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...You don't actually know what that is either, do you?"
I decide to take a look around the first floor to start.
I turn around. Clear is already up on the second floor, leaning over the railing.

name: クリア
message: "There are rooms on the second floor!"

name: クリア
message: "Also, I have something I would like to discuss."
Without further ado, Clear disappears down the second floor hall.
At the top of the stairs, I find another den-type area.
It has a pool table, a dart board, a small bar, and a TV.
The hall leading off it, down which Clear vanished, is lined with rooms.
I poke my head into one of the rooms.
It's a simple but nice room. Clear isn't in this one.
I go to check the one next door.
...There he is, sprawled out on the bed sound asleep. He still has the gas mask on.
I don't think he's a bad guy, but he sure is weird. I can never tell what's going through his head...
And it must be hard to breathe with that mask on all the time...
